description: OpenFOAM (for Open source Field Operation And Manipulation) is a C++ toolbox for the development of customized numerical solvers, and pre-/post-processing utilities for the solution of continuum mechanics problems, including computational fluid dynamics (CFD). The code is released as free and open-source software under the GNU General Public License. The OpenFOAM name was registered by OpenCFD Ltd in 2007 and non-exclusively licensed to the OpenFOAM Foundation Ltd in 2011.
author: Victor
